title: Ebert & Roeper - 04.06.08 - guest host Michael Phillips
description:
Ebert & Roeper  -  April 6th, 2008 - with guest host [url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/features/chi-michaelphillipscritic,1,931773.storygallery?coll=chi-entertainment-utl]Michael Phillips[/url], film critic for the Chicago Tribune

---- New movies this week:
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0410377/]Nim&#039;s Island[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0497972/]Sex and Death 101[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0379865/]Leatherheads[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0800039/]Forgetting Sarah Marshall[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0893382/]Shine a Light[/url]

--- Next Week
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0858479/]Smart People[/url]
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0421073/]Street Kings[/url]
--- Coming Soon
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0411061/]88 Minutes[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
SPOILERS - The following list gives the thumbs up or thumbs down vote which the movies received.  (Phillips - Roeper)
-------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0410377/]Nim&#039;s Island[/url]  -  (mild) up - (real good movie) up
-- Abigail Breslin - Gerard Butler - Jodie Foster

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0497972/]Sex and Death 101[/url]  -  (every which way but funny) down - up
-- Simon Baker - Winona Ryder - Leslie Bibb

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0379865/]Leatherheads[/url]  -  down - (mild) up
-- directed by George Clooney
-- George Clooney - RenÃƒÂ©e Zellweger - John Krasinski - Jonathan Pryce

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0800039/]Forgetting Sarah Marshall[/url]  -  (really, really, really funny) UP - (declaring undying love, on knees) UP
-- Jason Segel - Kristen Bell - Russell Brand - Jonah Hill - Mila Kunis - Paul Rudd - Bill Hader

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0893382/]Shine a Light[/url]  -  up - up
-- Rolling Stones music documentary by Martin Scorsese

	---Thumbs Up Video
		--Phillips:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0469494/]There Will Be Blood[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/There-Blood-Two-Disc-Special-Collectors/dp/B00104QSOM/ref=pd_bbs_sr_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1207665356&sr=8-1](amazon)[/url]
		--Roeper:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0841046/]Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Walk-Hard-Dewey-Two-Disc-Special/dp/B0012IWNZY/ref=pd_bbs_sr_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1207665247&sr=8-1](amazon)[/url]

	---NEW ON VIDEO
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0891527/]Lions for Lambs[/url]  -  (fumbled thumbs) down - (admirable with flaws thumbs) up
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0831884/]Reservation Road[/url]  -  down - down
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0760329/]The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep[/url]  -  down - down

	---Phillips&#039; Three to See (favorite movies currently in theaters)
